feed.title: Sault Ste. Marie - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Sault Ste. Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:44 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -6.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 09:00 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: -6.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 32.2 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: ENE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 5 cm. Wind east 30 km/h becoming north 20 late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 08 February 2023
